const response = await client.security.putRoleMapping({
  name: "mapping4",
  roles: ["superuser"],
  enabled: true,
  rules: {
    any: [
      {
        field: {
          username: "esadmin",
        },
      },
      {
        field: {
          groups: "cn=admins,dc=example,dc=com",
        },
      },
    ],
  },
});
console.log(response);
